resources.string:
For your (and everyone's) security, we require every 
person entering the college to fill out the form at least the day before.
You will be able to generate your secure QR code, 
showing it to the security office will grant you access tot he college building.
With this information we will be able to notify the right people in the case of a Covid case
Also, we\'ll make loads of cash with your data
Every field is required, please fill them before generating your QR code
What best describes you or your primary reason for entering Dawson?
How are you entering into Dawson?
What day do you plan on arriving?
What time do you plan on arriving?
